attributes.action: Bring the spongebob squarepants show back on netflix uk. Not the films the show
attributes.additional_details: Because Spongebob has been around for over 20 years and it has just been taken off of netflix?
attributes.background: Bring back Spongebob Squarepants back to netflix UK

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what content to provide are a matter for content providers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
